scripts.scss:dev: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass --source-map-embed true -o dist/css src/scss
scripts.scss:build: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css src/scss
scripts.css:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.css:build: npm run scss:build && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.js:dev: mkdir -p dist/js && babel src/js/*.js -o dist/js/script.js --source-maps inline
scripts.build: npm run css:build && npm run js:build
